content:

inventory=[{"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 56, "index": 12}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "gray_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 13, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "fishing_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_stairs", "quantity": 36, "index": 21}, {"type": "diorite_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 23}, {"type": "red_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 24}, {"type": "pink_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 21, "index": 26}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 7, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 9, "index": 30}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_carpet", "quantity": 7, "index": 36}, {"type": "magma_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 42}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a magenta_bed, I need to first craft jungle_planks. To craft jungle_planks, I need to place a stripped_jungle_wood in the crafting grid. The stripped_jungle_wood is in slot 19, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1
